name: Space Junker
description:
SPACE JUNKER is a game about navigating through space and collecting junk. Your tiny ship's job is to return space debris to the station for recycling, but space is perilous and players must carefully navigate past the powerful gravitational pull of nearby planets to avoid getting obliterated. See how much junk you can deliver!

Created in one weekend, Space Junker took first place at the Austin Community College Gravity-Themed Game Jam in Austin, TX. This game was created by the following designers and artists:

  • Alex Swift - design and coding
  • Tylan Limb - 3D modeling and materials
  • Chris Trevino - 3D modeling and 2D assets
  • Isaiah Martinez - sound design
